Blog.post: urlLink whoop urlLink
urlLink peek a boo urlLink
urlLink hi there urlLink
urlLink frikki's posing with the little spongy heart which says : cross the line, donate blood. urlLink
urlLink bad hair day urlLink
urlLink sundae in new top urlLink
urlLink today i received this mail from maggie. the blythes' outfits are packed nicely inside. urlLink

urlLink hmm.. i'm planning to sell her. i dun know why and gosh, i feel so guilty. what's wrong with me? in fact, i think that she's cute but somehow i feel that she's an outsider when placed together with my blythes. well, let's see how it goes... sorry about that, ivory. urlLink
urlLink frikki urlLink
urlLink good friends urlLink
urlLink huggies urlLink
urlLink this is ivory with her long, thick and curly hair. in fact her hair is all entangled at the bottom. urlLink
urlLink meet ivory in her new haircut. i gave her a haircut in the afternoon, after realising that it's very difficult to manage her curly long hair. urlLink
urlLink i cut frikki's bangs shorter to make her big round eyes stand out more. she look fresher after the cut. urlLink
urlLink a close up shot of sundae on a saturday afternoon. urlLink
urlLink yeah, i prefer her hairstyle now, looks younger and neat too. she's a cutie now. urlLink
urlLink these are the chillies aunt helen grew in her garden, she has mints, strawberry, chillies etc in her garden. urlLink
urlLink frikki is showing you where aunt helen's dog is. gorgeous
urlLink frikki is showing you the pots of plants in aunt helen's house. urlLink
urlLink the red beret and bag is handmade by me. she loves it. urlLink
urlLink frikki checked and said that there is no junk mail inside. urlLink
urlLink frikki insisted to pose beside this little plant. urlLink
urlLink frikki is fast asleep, must be due to talking too much to sundae and showing her around. rock a bye baby, rock-a-bye baby, in the tree top. when the wind blows, the cradle will rock. urlLink

urlLink saw this little wooden cabinet at watsons yesterday, and i thought to myself that it'll be just nice to fit in my little miniatures that i bought during the genting highlands trip. well, there are some empty space, does that mean i can still buy more. urlLink
urlLink i bought this bedroom set at robinsons, city hall. this is the only furniture set i have collected so far. i kinda stopped collecting the sylvanian families. urlLink
urlLink these are the only members of the sylvanian families i collected so far. my brother kidnapped the mother bunny and left her baby bunnies orphans. urlLink
urlLink this photo is taken in the toilet of hotel rendevous in brisbane. come on, frikki you got to smile more. urlLink

urlLink i am so happy that i saw this picnic basket at crazy clarks at redcliffe, brisbane. it'll be perfect to fit in my blythes. the basket came with some cups and saucers, but i threw them away as i dun need them. i filled the basket up with lots of goodies i bought at brisbane. urlLink

urlLink it's the time of the day, they have to do their usual exercise in order to keep fit. alright, frikki, keep your nose and chin up and look straight, not at the camera. sundae, legs higher, legs higher. yes, that's the way. urlLink
urlLink frikki says: " sundae, you're my good friend." sundae replied: " you too. i love you." urlLink
urlLink frikki, i know that you're very excited to have sundae as your best pal, but i think you better stop tugging her head. what are you trying to do? what are you thinking? urlLink

urlLink i realised that ivory has that high forehead too. hmm.. in fact, when placed together with my blythes, she looks a little alien. sorry about that, ivory. but i still love you. i will not abandon you, okay, hush hush. she's posing in frikki's clothes and wearing sundae's feathered hat. looks good, don't she? urlLink
urlLink meet ivory in her original outfit. she's pretty, isn't she? because her body is fully articulated, she's pretty fragile when i hold her. unlike my blythes, they're firm and stiff. urlLink
urlLink this is my first pullip, bought her for $95. she look classy with her hair and her outfit. urlLink

urlLink it's a pullip in the paperbag. i bought it at the same place, magma heritage at specialist centre. it's my first pullip. i saw a few pullip photos on the web, they look pretty. i kinda like the fully articulated body. that means that they can have more poses. urlLink
urlLink sundae is really a hollywood imitation. she's trying to imitate another blythe called hollywood. sundae, you better stop your nonsense. why dun you imitate arnold schwarzenegger? urlLink
urlLink sundae says hi to you all. she's in her original outfit. she looks so sweet with her soft curls. urlLink
urlLink isn't she lovely? she has blonde hair and bangs. she's the opposite of frikki, and that's why i bought her. she's gonna be a good companion for frikki. they'll be best friends. urlLink

urlLink guess what's in the paper bag? it's my 2nd blythe doll. i bought it at magma heritage for $125. they're selling it cheaper there, and the place really has lots of dolls. it's totally unlike the miserable actioncity which has only a few to choose from. urlLink
urlLink frikki is giving you free lessons on how to bend with style. come on, frikki, show them what you've got. urlLink
urlLink er... frikki.. what are you trying to do? urlLink
urlLink preparing for a boogie night? dun forget to wear your shoes. urlLink
urlLink here she is, posing with the sunflower which i always place beside my computer. frikki, remember to put it back where you took it from, okay? be a good girl. urlLink
urlLink so.. frikki, are you ready to go out to meet ang-mohs? urlLink

urlLink yea, i know... she looks glum. well, that's because i promised to bring her out but in the end, i didn't. she's very disappointed, i know that. i'll try to make it up to her. i'll get her a gift or something else to cheer her up. i am sorry, frikki. urlLink

urlLink she looks like mickey mouse with this two buns. i dun really like the centre gaze, i wanted to change the eye chips but i dun know how to. i tried the glue stick, but it doesn't work. the centre gaze looks a little eerie, seem to be looking nowhere. urlLink

urlLink how does she look with the new bangs? i hesitated for a while before i dare to go ahead with it. well, that's because i am afraid to ruin her hairstyle. but i guess it's because of her high forehead, that's why everyone says she looks freaky. urlLink

urlLink here she is, with her captivating eyes and pink lips, she's posing in the feather i bought at artfriend a while ago. i bought the feather because i thought of making a card for a friend, but now i guess the feather is in frikki's possession. i dun think i can get it back. urlLink

urlLink this 12 inch fashion doll’s eyes change color with the pull of a string. right now, she's in the mood of having green eyes. dressed up in the dress handmade by me and having her long hair tied up with a braid in front, she's my little princess. urlLink

urlLink i named her tammy at first, but everyone at home kept saying that she looks freaky. freaky comes up in my mind whenever i wanna call her tammy. so in the end, i have decided to name her frikki. right now, she is posing in the top i made for her. the flowers beside is from ben and julie for my graduation. urlLink
urlLink isn't she lovely? she's a love mission. i chose her out of the other blythes because of her dark long hair. she looks mysterious, and she comes with a police uniform and a red gown. urlLink
urlLink welcome home, my first blythe. julie accompanied me to heeren to buy it. there were only 4 blythes at actioncity to choose from. i chose a love mission and bought it for $149.90 urlLink
